parameters.name: LogAnalytics
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces'
| project id, name
| order by name desc

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
resources
| where type contains  "desktopvirtualization"
| summarize Count = count() by resourceGroup
| project Label = resourceGroup, Id = resourceGroup, Selected = Count >= 0

parameters.name: HostPool
parameters.label: Host Pool
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.desktopvirtualization/hostpools" and resourceGroup == "{ResourceGroup}"

parameters.name: WVDHosts
parameters.query:
WVDAgentHealthStatus
| distinct SessionHostName

parameters.name: pooldiag
parameters.query: {"version":"ARMEndpoint/1.0","data":null,"headers":[],"method":"GET","path":"/{HostPool}/providers/microsoft.insights/diagnosticSettings?api-version=2021-05-01-preview","urlParams":[],"batchDisabled":false,"transformers":[{"type":"jsonpath","settings":{"tablePath":"$.value[*].properties","columns":[{"path":"$.workspaceId","columnid":"value"},{"path":"$.workspaceId","columnid":"disp"},{"path":"$.workspaceId","columnid":"selected"}]}}]}

parameters.name: poolla
parameters.query:
resources
| take 1
| project diag=dynamic([{pooldiag}])
| mv-expand diag
| project tostring(diag)
| where diag != 'null'
| project diag, disp=diag, selected=1

parameters.name: WVDHostsId
parameters.query: {"version":"ARMEndpoint/1.0","data":null,"headers":[],"method":"GETARRAY","path":"/subscriptions/{Subscription:id}/resourcegroups/{ResourceGroup}/providers/Microsoft.DesktopVirtualization/hostpools/{HostPool:label}/sessionhosts?api-version=2019-01-23-preview","urlParams":[],"batchDisabled":false,"transformers":[{"type":"jsonpath","settings":{"columns":[{"path":"$.properties.resourceId","columnid":"Id"},{"path":"$.properties.resourceId","columnid":"Disp"},{"path":"$.properties.resourceId","columnid":"selected"}]}}]}

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/extensions"and properties.type == "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent"
| extend vmname = extract("(.*?)/extensions",1, id)
| where vmname in~ ({WVDHostsId})
| project Value = parse_json(properties.settings).workspaceId, selected=true
| limit 1

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"
| where properties.customerId == "{WorkspaceId}"

parameters.name: wvdworkspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.desktopvirtualization/applicationgroups"
| project id, workspace= properties.workspaceArmPath, hp=properties.hostPoolArmPath
| where isnotnull(workspace)
| where hp =~ "{HostPool}"
| project workspace, label=workspace,selected=1

parameters.name: HostPoolOld
parameters.label: Host Pool From Logs
parameters.description: Select a host pool to show only data of this specific one
parameters.query:
WVDConnections 
| extend HostPool=split(_ResourceId,"/")[8] 
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| distinct tostring(HostPool) 
| where HostPool =~ "{HostPool:name}"
| distinct HostPool

parameters.name: SessionHostSelector
parameters.label: Opt: Session Host
parameters.description: Select a session host to drill down into the data. Don't select a session host to disable this filter.
parameters.query: WVDConnections | extend HostPool=split(_ResourceId,"/")[8] | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and HostPool=="{HostPoolOld}" |distinct SessionHostName | order by SessionHostName

parameters.name: UserSelector
parameters.label: Opt: User
parameters.description: Select a user to drill down into the data. Don't select a user to disable this filter.
parameters.query: WVDConnections | extend HostPool=split(_ResourceId,"/")[8] | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and HostPool=="{HostPoolOld}" | distinct UserName | order by UserName

parameters.name: ErrorSelector
parameters.label: Error Selector
parameters.description: Select an error to drill down into the data. Don't select an item to disable this filter.
parameters.query:
WVDErrors | extend HostPool=split(_ResourceId,"/")[8] | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and HostPool=="{HostPoolOld}" 
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "Unspecified error","Unspecified error",CodeSymbolic)
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "The system cannot open the file.","The system cannot open the file.",CodeSymbolic)
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "The RPC server is unavailable.","The RPC server is unavailable.",CodeSymbolic)
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "No such interface supported","No such interface supported",CodeSymbolic)
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "No process is on the other end of the pipe.","No process is on the other end of the pipe.",CodeSymbolic)
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "Operation aborted","	Operation aborted",CodeSymbolic)
| distinct tostring(CodeSymbolic) | order by CodeSymbolic

parameters.name: hostnames

content.json:
### Session Host Search Tool
Use the search box below to find which Host Pool a Virtual Machine belongs to.

content.query:
desktopvirtualizationresources
| where type == "microsoft.desktopvirtualization/hostpools/sessionhosts"
| extend SplitAll=split(name,'/')
| extend HostPool = SplitAll[0]
| extend SessionHostNameSplit = tostring(SplitAll[1])
| extend SplitAll2=split(SessionHostNameSplit,'.')
| extend SessionHostName = tostring(SplitAll2[0])
| where SessionHostName contains "{HostNameSearch}"
| project id, SessionHostName, Status=properties.status, HostPool, Sessions=properties.sessions, AllowSessions=properties.allowNewSession, AssignedUser=properties.assignedUser, OS=properties.osVersion, UpdateStatus=properties.updateStatus, UpdateState=properties.updateState, SxSVersion=properties.sxSStackVersion, ImageType=properties.imageType
	| join kind=leftouter(
Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| extend SplitAll=split(name, '.')
| extend SessionHostName=tostring(SplitAll[0])
| project SessionHostName, VMStatus=properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.displayStatus) on SessionHostName
| project SessionHostName, HostPool, VMStatus, Status, Sessions, AllowSessions, AssignedUser, OS, UpdateStatus, UpdateState, SxSVersion, ImageType
| sort by SessionHostName
content.title: Find Session Host and Host Pool

WVDConnections | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by CorrelationId
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by CorrelationId  // workaround to filter "double-entries"
| join kind=leftouter (
    WVDErrors | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by CorrelationId
) on CorrelationId
| extend HostPool=split(_ResourceId,"/")[8] 
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "Unspecified error","Unspecified error",CodeSymbolic) // workaround
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "The system cannot open the file.","The system cannot open the file.",CodeSymbolic) // workaround
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "The RPC server is unavailable.","The RPC server is unavailable.",CodeSymbolic) // workaround
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "No such interface supported","No such interface supported",CodeSymbolic) // workaround
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "No process is on the other end of the pipe.","No process is on the other end of the pipe.",CodeSymbolic) // workaround
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "Operation aborted","	Operation aborted",CodeSymbolic) // workaround
| where  TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and HostPool=="{HostPoolOld}" and UserName !="" and ("{UserSelector}"=="" or UserName in ('' {UserSelector})) and (column_ifexists("SessionHostName","*")=="*" or "{SessionHostSelector}"=="" or column_ifexists("SessionHostName","") in ('' {SessionHostSelector})) and (column_ifexists("CodeSymbolic","*")=="*" or "{ErrorSelector}"=="" or column_ifexists("CodeSymbolic","") in ('' {ErrorSelector}) or CodeSymbolic=="")
| summarize Success=countif(CodeSymbolic==""), Errors=countif(CodeSymbolic!="") 
| extend Temp = pack("Success",Success,"Errors",Errors )
| mv-expand kind=array Temp
| project Action=tostring(Temp[0]), Count=toint(Temp[1])
content.title: Brokered sessions

content.query:
// Duration for the login process from the WVD ARM backend. This includes all steps between clicking the application icon to get notified by the RD agent that the session is established (not for reconnected sessions). 
// This includes entering the credentials for the session hosts (if not saved). Note: This inculdes re-connected sessions and no failed connections
WVDConnections 
| extend HostPool=split(_ResourceId,"/")[8] 
| join kind=leftouter (WVDErrors) on CorrelationId
| where  TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and HostPool=="{HostPoolOld}" and UserName !="" and ("{UserSelector}"=="" or UserName in ('' {UserSelector})) and (column_ifexists("SessionHostName","*")=="*" or "{SessionHostSelector}"=="" or column_ifexists("SessionHostName","") in ('' {SessionHostSelector})) and (column_ifexists("CodeSymbolic","*")=="*" or "{ErrorSelector}"=="" or column_ifexists("CodeSymbolic","") in ('' {ErrorSelector})) and (State =="Connected" or State == "Started")
| extend Multi=split(_ResourceId, "/")
| project ResourceAlias, HostPool=toupper(HP=Multi[8]), SessionHost=SessionHostName , UserName , CorrelationId, TimeGenerated, ResourceGroup=Multi[4], DesktopGroup_s=toupper(strcat(RG=Multi[4],".", HP=Multi[8])) 
| order by TimeGenerated desc 
| summarize StartTime=min(TimeGenerated), max(TimeGenerated) by CorrelationId, User=UserName, HostPool, SessionHost
| extend Duration=max_TimeGenerated-StartTime | where Duration !=0 
| project StartTime, User, HostPool, SessionHost, Duration, CorrelationId
| summarize ["Duration in seconds"]=avg(Duration/1s) by HostPool
content.title: Session login time (s)

content.json: This chart shows the number of successful and un-successful brokered sessions by host pools.

This chart shows the average login time for users to the host pools. The duration covers all steps between clicking the application icon up to notification of the RD agent that the session is ready. This includes all successful logins and reconnections to sessions.

| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "The RPC server is unavailable.","The RPC server is unavailable.",CodeSymbolic) // workaround
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "No such interface supported","No such interface supported",CodeSymbolic) // workaround
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "No process is on the other end of the pipe.","No process is on the other end of the pipe.",CodeSymbolic) // workaround
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "Operation aborted","	Operation aborted",CodeSymbolic) // workaround
| where  TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and HostPool=="{HostPoolOld}" and UserName !="" and ("{UserSelector}"=="" or UserName in ('' {UserSelector})) and (column_ifexists("SessionHostName","*")=="*" or "{SessionHostSelector}"=="" or column_ifexists("SessionHostName","") in ('' {SessionHostSelector})) and (column_ifexists("CodeSymbolic","*")=="*" or "{ErrorSelector}"=="" or column_ifexists("CodeSymbolic","") in ('' {ErrorSelector}))
| extend IPSegmentC=strcat(split(ClientSideIPAddress,".")[0],".",split(ClientSideIPAddress,".")[1],".",split(ClientSideIPAddress,".")[2])
| summarize Count=count() by CodeSymbolic

WVDErrors | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by CorrelationId
| extend HostPool=split(_ResourceId,"/")[8]
| extend CodeSymbolic=iff(CodeSymbolic startswith_cs "Unspecified error","Unspecified error",CodeSymbolic) // workaround

Volume of connections by connection result

seriesLabelSettings.label: Connections unable to reach a host

items.name: Volume of connections by connection result

content.query:
// Success rate of establishing a connection state when attempted by the user
WVDConnections
| join kind=leftsemi
(
    WVDConnections
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
    | distinct CorrelationId
) on CorrelationId
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by CorrelationId
| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| join kind=leftouter
(
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where Source == "RDStack" and Name == "RdpStackConnectionEstablished"
    | project CorrelationId, Connected=true
) on CorrelationId
| extend Connected=coalesce(Connected, false)
// Split the activity ID into the "session ID" (first 36-4=32 characters of the GUID, same value for all reconnections) and the last 4 characters are the attempt index (0 for initial connection, increment for each reconnect)
| extend SessionId=substring(CorrelationId, 0, 36 - 4),
         AttemptIndex=toint(strcat("0x", substring(CorrelationId, 36 - 2), substring(CorrelationId, 36 - 4, 2))) // Swap the last two pairs of characters, and intrepret as hex
// For each attempt in a session, verify that checkpoints from the host confirm the connection
| summarize Success=countif(Connected)>0, StartTime=min(TimeGenerated) by SessionId
| make-series 
    SuccessSessions=dcountif(SessionId, Success) default=0,
    TotalSessions=dcount(SessionId) default=toint(0) // Cast to prevent double.nan which is more difficult to fill in with series_fill_const
    on StartTime step {TimeRange:grain}
| project StartTime, AnyAttemptSuccessRate=series_fill_const(series_divide(SuccessSessions,TotalSessions), 1)
//{FocusFailures} // Reference parameter to force refresh on change
content.title: Connection success rate
content.noDataMessage: No connections were started in the selected time range

content.query:
// Success rate of establishing a connection state when attempted by the user
WVDConnections
| join kind=leftsemi
(
    WVDConnections
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
    | distinct CorrelationId
) on CorrelationId
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by CorrelationId
| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| join kind=leftouter
(
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where Source == "RDStack" and Name == "RdpStackConnectionEstablished"
    | project CorrelationId, Connected=true
) on CorrelationId
| extend Connected=coalesce(Connected, false)
// Split the activity ID into the "session ID" (first 36-4=32 characters of the GUID, same value for all reconnections) and the last 4 characters are the attempt index (0 for initial connection, increment for each reconnect)
| extend SessionId=substring(CorrelationId, 0, 36 - 4),
         AttemptIndex=toint(strcat("0x", substring(CorrelationId, 36 - 2), substring(CorrelationId, 36 - 4, 2))) // Swap the last two pairs of characters, and intrepret as hex
// For each attempt in a session, verify that checkpoints from the host confirm the connection
| summarize Attempts=dcount(CorrelationId), Success=countif(Connected)>0, FirstAttempt=min(TimeGenerated) by UserName, SessionId
| where bin_at(FirstAttempt, {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:start}) between(({ConnectionTimeBrush:start})..({ConnectionTimeBrush:end}))
| sort by FirstAttempt asc
| where not(Success) or not("{FocusFailures}" contains "Focus on failures")
| project FirstAttempt, SessionId=strcat(iif(Success, "", ""), " ", SessionId, "*"), UserName, Attempts
| take 250 // prevent the tooltip that takes up vertical space. is 250 reasonable? can be adjusted by customers by editing the query and visual config

content.query:
// % of users able to reach a session host
WVDConnections
| join kind=leftsemi
(
    WVDConnections
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
    | distinct CorrelationId
) on CorrelationId
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by CorrelationId
| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| join kind=leftouter
(
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where Source == "RDStack" and Name == "RdpStackConnectionEstablished"
    | project CorrelationId, Connected=true
) on CorrelationId
| extend Connected=coalesce(Connected, false)
| summarize Connected=countif(Connected)>0 by UserName, TimeGenerated=bin_at(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:start})
| make-series UsersConnecting=dcountif(UserName, Connected) default=0, TotalUsers=dcount(UserName) default=toint(0) on TimeGenerated step {TimeRange:grain}
| project TimeGenerated, UsersAbleToConnect=series_fill_const(series_divide(UsersConnecting, TotalUsers), 1)
//{FocusFailures} // Reference parameter to force refresh on change

content.query:
// % of users able to reach a session host
WVDConnections
| join kind=leftsemi
(
    WVDConnections
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
    | distinct CorrelationId
) on CorrelationId
| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by CorrelationId
| join kind=leftouter
(
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where Source == "RDStack" and Name == "RdpStackConnectionEstablished"
    | project CorrelationId, Connected=true
) on CorrelationId
| extend Connected=coalesce(Connected, false)
// Split the activity ID into the "session ID" (first 36-4=32 characters of the GUID, same value for all reconnections) and the last 4 characters are the attempt index (0 for initial connection, increment for each reconnect)
| extend SessionId=substring(CorrelationId, 0, 36 - 4),
         AttemptIndex=toint(strcat("0x", substring(CorrelationId, 36 - 2), substring(CorrelationId, 36 - 4, 2))) // Swap the last two pairs of characters, and intrepret as hex
| summarize FirstAttempt=min(TimeGenerated), TotalAttempts=dcount(CorrelationId), Success=dcountif(CorrelationId, Connected)>0, SampleSession=any(SessionId) by UserName, BinnedTime=bin_at(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:start})
| where BinnedTime between(({ConnectionTimeBrush:start})..({ConnectionTimeBrush:end}))
| where not(Success) or not("{FocusFailures}" contains "Focus on failures")
| sort by FirstAttempt desc, Success asc, UserName asc
| project FirstAttempt, SampleSession=strcat(SampleSession, "*"), UserName=strcat(iif(Success, "", ""), " ", UserName), Attempts=TotalAttempts
| take 250 // prevent the tooltip that takes up vertical space. is 250 reasonable? can be adjusted by customers by editing the query and visual config

parameters.name: ReportBy
parameters.label: Report by
parameters.query:
let FullList = datatable(Value:string)["Host", "User", "Resource", "Client"];
let GetConnectionFailures = (BaseData:(Slicer:string, CorrelationId:string, UserName:string, ResourceAlias:string, SessionHostName:string, Client:string, TimeGenerated:datetime , Connected:bool), ViewName:string)
{
    BaseData
    | summarize Users=dcount(UserName), Resources=dcount(ResourceAlias), Hosts=dcount(SessionHostName), Clients=dcount(Client), LastAttempt=max(TimeGenerated), Attempts=dcount(CorrelationId), View=ViewName, Activities=makeset(CorrelationId) by Slicer, Connected
    | as BySlicer
    | where Connected != true
    | join kind=leftanti
    (
        BySlicer
        | where Connected
    ) on Slicer
    | project-away Connected
};
WVDConnections
| where State == "Completed"
| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| join kind=leftouter
(
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where Source == "RDStack" and Name == "RdpStackConnectionEstablished"
    | project CorrelationId, Connected=true
) on CorrelationId
| extend SessionHostName=trim_end(@"\..*", SessionHostName), Client=strcat(replace("com.microsoft.rdc.", "", ClientType), " ", ClientVersion)
| as BaseData
| extend Slicer=UserName
| invoke GetConnectionFailures("User")
| union 
(
    BaseData
    | extend Slicer=Client
    | invoke GetConnectionFailures("Client")
)
| union 
(
    BaseData
    | extend Slicer=SessionHostName
    | invoke GetConnectionFailures("Host")
)
| union 
(
    BaseData
    | extend Slicer=ResourceAlias
    | invoke GetConnectionFailures("Resource")
)
| where strlen(Slicer) > 2
| sort by View, Attempts desc 
| summarize Items=dcount(Slicer) by Value=View
| join kind=fullouter FullList on Value
| project Value=coalesce(Value, Value1), Items=coalesce(Items, 0)
| project Value, Label=strcat(Value, " (", Items, ")")

content.query:
let GetConnectionFailures = (BaseData:(Slicer:string, CorrelationId:string, UserName:string, ResourceAlias:string, SessionHostName:string, Client:string, TimeGenerated:datetime , Connected:bool), ViewName:string)
{
    BaseData
    | summarize Users=dcount(UserName), Resources=dcount(ResourceAlias), Hosts=dcount(SessionHostName), Clients=dcount(Client), LastAttempt=max(TimeGenerated), Attempts=dcount(CorrelationId), View=ViewName, Activities=makeset(CorrelationId)
             by Slicer, Connected
    | as BySlicer
    | where Connected != true
    | join kind=leftanti // Exclude the users that managed to connect
    (
        BySlicer
        | where Connected
    ) on Slicer
    | project-away Connected
};
WVDConnections
| where State == "Completed"
| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| join kind=leftouter
(
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where Source == "RDStack" and Name == "RdpStackConnectionEstablished"
    | project CorrelationId, Connected=true
) on CorrelationId
| extend SessionHostName=trim_end(@"\..*", SessionHostName), Client=strcat(replace("com.microsoft.rdc.", "", ClientType), " ", ClientVersion)
| as BaseData
| extend Slicer=UserName
| invoke GetConnectionFailures("User")
| union 
(
    BaseData
    | extend Slicer=Client
    | invoke GetConnectionFailures("Client")
)
| union 
(
    BaseData
    | extend Slicer=SessionHostName
    | invoke GetConnectionFailures("Host")
)
| union 
(
    BaseData
    | extend Slicer=ResourceAlias
    | invoke GetConnectionFailures("Resource")
)
| where strlen(Slicer) > 2
| where View == "{ReportBy}"
| sort by View, Attempts desc 
| project {ReportBy}=Slicer, Attempts, LastAttempt, Users, Resources, Hosts, Clients, Activities, Slicer
| project-away {ReportBy}s // Remove the count of the dimension used as a slicer, since it will always be 1

content.query:
let GetPrettyError=(ErrorName:string, ErrorCode:string)
{
    iif(ErrorName !in ('', '<>'), strcat(ErrorName, ' (', ErrorCode, ')'), ErrorCode)
};
WVDConnections
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| extend Client=strcat(replace("com.microsoft.rdc.", "", ClientType), " ", ClientVersion)
| extend PredecessorConnectionId=replace("<>", "", trim(@"{|}", PredecessorConnectionId))
| as Connections
| where State=="Started"
| extend StartTime = TimeGenerated
| join kind=leftouter
(
    Connections
    | summarize (EndTime, State)=arg_max(TimeGenerated, State) by CorrelationId
) on CorrelationId
| extend State=coalesce(State1, State)
| join kind=leftouter
(
    WVDErrors
    | project CorrelationId, ServiceError, Source, Error = GetPrettyError(CodeSymbolic, Code)
    | distinct *
    | summarize Errors=count() by CorrelationId
) on CorrelationId
| project CorrelationId, SessionId=strcat(substring(CorrelationId, 0, strlen(CorrelationId) - 4), "*"), UserName, SessionHostName, Errors=coalesce(Errors, 0), StartTime, EndTime, Duration=bin(EndTime-StartTime, 1s), ClientType, ClientVersion
| summarize StartTime=min(StartTime), EndTime=max(EndTime), Duration=sum(Duration), Attempts=dcount(CorrelationId), Errors=sum(Errors), CorrelationId=makeset(CorrelationId)
         by UserName, SessionHostName, SessionId, Client=strcat(replace("com.microsoft.rdc.", "", ClientType), " ", ClientVersion)
| project UserName, SessionHostName, SessionId, Attempts, Errors, Client, StartTime, Duration, CorrelationId

parameters.name: wvdActivityType
parameters.label: Activity type
parameters.description: Scope top errors by activity type
parameters.query:
WVDErrors
| distinct ActivityType
| sort by ActivityType asc

content.query:
let GetPrettyError=(ErrorName:string, ErrorCode:string)
{
    iif(ErrorName !in ('', '<>'), strcat(ErrorName, ' (', ErrorCode, ')'), ErrorCode)
};
WVDConnections
| where "{wvdActivityType}" == "Connection" and _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| union (WVDFeeds             | where "{wvdActivityType}" == "Feed" and _ResourceId =~ '{wvdworkspace}')
| union (WVDManagement        | where "{wvdActivityType}" == "Management" and (_ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}' or _ResourceId =~ '{wvdworkspace}'))
| union (WVDHostRegistrations | where "{wvdActivityType}" == "RegistrationToken" and _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}')
| join kind=rightouter
(
    WVDErrors
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and ActivityType == "{wvdActivityType}" and (_ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}' or _ResourceId =~ '{wvdworkspace}')
    | extend Error=GetPrettyError(CodeSymbolic, Code)
) on CorrelationId
| as ErrorList
| make-series ActivitiesImpactedOverTime=dcount(CorrelationId) default=0,
              UsersImpactedOverTime=dcountif(UserName, strlen(UserName) > 2) default=0,
              HostsImpactedOverTime=dcountif(SessionHostName, strlen(SessionHostName) > 2) default=0
           on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ActivityType, ServiceError, Source, Error
| join kind=inner
(
    ErrorList
    | summarize MessageSample=any(Message), TotalActivitiesImpacted=dcount(CorrelationId), TotalUsersImpacted=dcountif(UserName, strlen(UserName) > 2), TotalHostsImpacted=dcountif(SessionHostName, strlen(SessionHostName) > 2)
             by ActivityType, ServiceError, Source, Error
) on ActivityType, ServiceError, Source, Error
| project Kind=iif(ServiceError, "Service", "Deployment"), Source, Error, MessageSample, TotalActivitiesImpacted, ActivitiesImpactedOverTime, TotalUsersImpacted, UsersImpactedOverTime, TotalHostsImpacted, HostsImpactedOverTime
// Hosts count not applicable for Feed activities, so blank out the columns
| extend TotalHostsImpacted=iif("{wvdActivityType}" != "Feed", TotalHostsImpacted, int(null)), HostsImpactedOverTime=iif("{wvdActivityType}" != "Feed", HostsImpactedOverTime, series_divide(HostsImpactedOverTime, todouble(0/0)))
| sort by TotalUsersImpacted, TotalActivitiesImpacted, TotalHostsImpacted
| top {TopNErrors} by TotalActivitiesImpacted

content.query:
WVDConnections
| where UserName == '{UserName}'
| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| as SourceData
| where State=="Started"
| project-rename StartTime=TimeGenerated
| join kind=fullouter
(
    SourceData
    | where State == "Completed"
    | project CorrelationId, SessionHostName, EndTime=TimeGenerated
) on CorrelationId
| project CorrelationId=coalesce(CorrelationId, CorrelationId1), StartTime=coalesce(StartTime, {TimeRange:start}), EndTime=coalesce(EndTime, {TimeRange:end}), SessionHostName=coalesce(SessionHostName, SessionHostName1)
| extend ProbeTime = range(bin_at(StartTime, {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:start}), bin_at(EndTime + {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:end}), {TimeRange:grain})
| mv-expand ProbeTime to typeof(datetime)
| extend ConnectionContainsProbe = (StartTime < ProbeTime and EndTime > ProbeTime),
         ConnectionEndedInPreviousBucket = (StartTime < ProbeTime and EndTime + {TimeRange:grain} >= ProbeTime)
| make-series Connections=dcountif(CorrelationId, ConnectionContainsProbe or ConnectionEndedInPreviousBucket) on ProbeTime from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Host=trim_end(@"\..*", SessionHostName)

content.query:
WVDConnections
| where UserName == '{UserName}' and _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| as Connections
| where State == "Connected" and TimeGenerated <= {TimeRange:end}
| join kind=inner
(
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where (Name == "LaunchExecutable" and Parameters.connectionStage == "RdpShellAppExecuted") or Name=="RdpShellAppExecuted"
    | project CorrelationId, Parameters=tostring(Parameters.filename)
    | extend Parameters=trim('"', Parameters) // remove quotes for paths with spaces in them
    | extend Parameters=replace(@"^(.*[\\\/])", "", tolower(Parameters)) // remove binary path to only keep file name
    | extend Parameters=replace(@"microsoft.windows(.+)_8wekyb3d8bbwe!app", @"\1", Parameters) //inbox apps to readable format
) on CorrelationId
| summarize TotalLaunches=dcount(CorrelationId), DaysLaunched=dcount(bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)), Clients=dcount(ClientType) by Parameters
| extend Subtitle="Launches / Days with usage", Clients=strcat("Used on ", Clients, iif(Clients > 1, " different ", " "), "client", iif(Clients > 1, "s", ""))
| sort by TotalLaunches desc
content.title: Remote apps used

content.query:
WVDConnections
| where UserName == '{UserName}' and _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| as Connections
| where State == "Started" and TimeGenerated <= {TimeRange:end}
| extend StartTime = TimeGenerated
| join kind=leftouter
(
    Connections
    | where UserName == "{UserName}" and State == "Completed"
    | extend EndTime = TimeGenerated
)
on CorrelationId
| extend EndTime = coalesce(EndTime, {TimeRange:end})
| where EndTime >= {TimeRange:start}
// limit duration hours to our timeframe even if connection spanned the edges...
| extend Duration = min_of(EndTime, {TimeRange:end}) - max_of(StartTime, {TimeRange:start})
| summarize Duration = sum(Duration) by Host=trim_end(@"\..*", SessionHostName)
| project Host, UsageHours = Duration / 1h
content.title: Connection time by host
Key usage numbers

content.query:
WVDConnections
| where _ResourceId =~ "{HostPool}" and UserName == "{UserName}"
| as ConnectionData
| where State == "Started"
| join kind = leftsemi
(
    // Only include connections that actually reached the host to prevent short (failed) attempts from skewing the data
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where Source == "RDStack" and Name =~ "RdpStackConnectionEstablished" and _ResourceId =~ "{HostPool}"
) on CorrelationId

| join kind = inner
(
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where _ResourceId =~ "{HostPool}"
    | where Name =~ "LoadBalancedNewConnection"
    | extend LoadBalanceOutcome=Parameters.LoadBalanceOutcome
    | project CorrelationId, ConnectionBackground=case(LoadBalanceOutcome == "NewSession", "New session", LoadBalanceOutcome in ("Active", "Disconnected", "Pending"), "Existing session", LoadBalanceOutcome)
) on CorrelationId
| join kind = inner
(
    WVDCheckpoints // new session
    | where _ResourceId =~ "{HostPool}"
    | where Name =~ "ShellReady" or (Name =~ "LaunchExecutable" and Parameters.connectionStage == "RdpShellAppExecuted") or Name=~"RdpShellAppExecuted"
    | project TimeNewSessions=TimeGenerated, CorrelationId
    | summarize TimeNewSessions=min(TimeNewSessions) by CorrelationId

) on CorrelationId
| join kind = inner ( 
        ConnectionData // existent Sessions
        | where State == "Connected"
        | project TimeConnected=TimeGenerated, CorrelationId
) on CorrelationId
| extend ProductiveTime = iff(ConnectionBackground=="New session",TimeNewSessions, TimeConnected)
| join kind = leftouter
(  
    //OnCredentialsAcquisitionCompleted	2021-09-13T16:48:50.4440000Z	Client	{"CredentialType":"SavedPassword","DurationMS":"9","Success":"True"}
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where _ResourceId =~ "{HostPool}"
    | where Name =~ "OnCredentialsAcquisitionCompleted"
    | project CorrelationId, credaquire = Parameters.DurationMS   
) on CorrelationId
| join kind = leftouter
(  
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where _ResourceId =~ "{HostPool}"
    | where Name =~ "SSOTokenRetrieval"
    | project CorrelationId, ssotokeretrieval = Parameters.DurationMS
) on CorrelationId
| extend ProductiveTime = (ProductiveTime - TimeGenerated) / 1s - (coalesce(credaquire,0)/1000) - (coalesce(ssotokeretrieval,0)/1000)
| make-series Median=percentile(ProductiveTime, 50) on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ConnectionBackground
content.title: Time to connect

content.query:
let GetPrettyError=(ErrorName:string, ErrorCode:string)
{
    iif(ErrorName !in ('', '<>'), strcat(ErrorName, ' (', ErrorCode, ')'), ErrorCode)
};
WVDConnections
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and UserName == "{UserName}" and _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| extend Client=strcat(replace("com.microsoft.rdc.", "", ClientType), " ", ClientVersion)
| extend  PredecessorConnectionId=replace("<>", "", trim(@"{|}", PredecessorConnectionId))
| as Connections
| where State=="Started"
| extend StartTime = TimeGenerated
| join kind=leftouter
(
    Connections
    | summarize (EndTime, State)=arg_max(TimeGenerated, State) by CorrelationId
) on CorrelationId
| extend State=coalesce(State1, State)
| join kind=leftouter
(
    WVDErrors
    | project CorrelationId, ServiceError, Source, Error = GetPrettyError(CodeSymbolic, Code)
    | distinct *
    | summarize Errors=count() by CorrelationId
) on CorrelationId
| project CorrelationId, SessionId=strcat(substring(CorrelationId, 0, strlen(CorrelationId) - 4), "*"), UserName, SessionHostName, Errors=coalesce(Errors, 0), StartTime, EndTime, Duration=bin(EndTime-StartTime, 1s), ClientType, ClientVersion
| summarize InitialConnection=min(StartTime), EndTime=max(EndTime), Duration=sum(Duration)/1s, Attempts=dcount(CorrelationId), Errors=sum(Errors), CorrelationId=makeset(CorrelationId)
         by SessionHostName, SessionId, Client=strcat(replace("com.microsoft.rdc.", "", ClientType), " v", ClientVersion)
| project HostName=trim_end(@"\..*", SessionHostName), SessionId, Attempts, Errors, Client, Duration, InitialConnection, CorrelationId

content.query:
let GetPrettyError=(ErrorName:string, ErrorCode:string)
{
    iif(ErrorName !in ('', '<>'), strcat(ErrorName, ' (', ErrorCode, ')'), ErrorCode)
};
WVDConnections
| where "{wvdActivityType}" == "Connection" and UserName == "{UserName}" and _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}' 
| union (WVDFeeds             | where "{wvdActivityType}" == "Feed"             and UserName == "{UserName}" and _ResourceId =~ '{wvdworkspace}')
| union (WVDManagement        | where "{wvdActivityType}" == "Management"       and UserName == "{UserName}" and (_ResourceId =~ '{wvdworkspace}' or _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'))
| join kind=rightouter
(
    WVDErrors
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and ActivityType == "{wvdActivityType}" and (_ResourceId =~ '{wvdworkspace}' or _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}')
    | extend Error=GetPrettyError(CodeSymbolic, Code)
) on CorrelationId
| as ErrorList
| make-series ActivitiesImpactedOverTime=dcount(CorrelationId) default=0,
              HostsImpactedOverTime=dcountif(SessionHostName, strlen(SessionHostName) > 2) default=0
           on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ActivityType, ServiceError, Source, Error
| join kind=inner
(
    ErrorList
    | summarize MessageSample=any(Message), TotalActivitiesImpacted=dcount(CorrelationId), TotalUsersImpacted=dcountif(UserName, strlen(UserName) > 2), TotalHostsImpacted=dcountif(SessionHostName, strlen(SessionHostName) > 2)
             by ActivityType, ServiceError, Source, Error
) on ActivityType, ServiceError, Source, Error
| project Kind=iif(ServiceError, "Service", "Deployment"), Source, Error, MessageSample, TotalActivitiesImpacted, ActivitiesImpactedOverTime, TotalHostsImpacted, HostsImpactedOverTime
// Hosts count not applicable for Feed activities, so blank out the columns
| extend TotalHostsImpacted=iif("{wvdActivityType}" != "Feed", TotalHostsImpacted, int(null)), HostsImpactedOverTime=iif("{wvdActivityType}" != "Feed", HostsImpactedOverTime, series_divide(HostsImpactedOverTime, todouble(0/0)))
| sort by TotalActivitiesImpacted, TotalHostsImpacted
| top {TopNErrors} by TotalActivitiesImpacted
content.title: Ranking of errors impacting {wvdActivityType} activities for {UserName} in {TimeRange:label}
content.noDataMessage: No errors reported in the selected time period

parameters.name: ActivityType
parameters.label: Activity type
parameters.description: The type of activity generated by the client as it communicates with the AVD service. Connection activities are generated when a user actively chooses to connect to a published resource on a VM. Feed refresh activities are generated when the client retrieves the list of those published resources, which can happen automatically in the background.

content.query:
WVDConnections
| where ("{ActivityType}" == Type or "{ActivityType}" == "*") and _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| distinct CorrelationId, UserName, ClientType, ClientVersion
| union
(
    WVDFeeds
    | where ("{ActivityType}" == Type or "{ActivityType}" == "*") and _ResourceId =~ '{wvdworkspace}'
    | distinct CorrelationId, UserName, ClientType, ClientVersion
)
| summarize Users=dcount(UserName), Activities=dcount(CorrelationId), Versions=dcount(ClientVersion) by ClientType
| project ClientType, ClientShort=replace("com.microsoft.rdc.", "", ClientType), Versions, Users, Activities
| extend AggregationLevel="ClientVersion", ChartTitle=strcat("Active users (on ", ClientShort, ") by client version over time")
| sort by Users desc, Activities desc

exportedParameters.defaultValue: Active users by client type over time

content.query:
WVDConnections
| where "{ActivityType}" == Type or "{ActivityType}" == "*"
| where ("{SelectedClientType}" == "*" or "{SelectedClientType}" == ClientType) and _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| as SourceData
| where State=="Started"
| project-rename StartTime=TimeGenerated
| join kind=fullouter
(
    SourceData
    | where State == "Completed"
    | project CorrelationId, UserName, ClientVersion, ClientType, EndTime=TimeGenerated
) on CorrelationId
| project CorrelationId=coalesce(CorrelationId, CorrelationId1), UserName=coalesce(UserName, UserName1), StartTime=coalesce(StartTime, {TimeRange:start}), EndTime=coalesce(EndTime, {TimeRange:end}), ClientType=coalesce(ClientType, ClientType1), ClientVersion=coalesce(ClientVersion, ClientVersion1)
| union
(
    WVDFeeds
    | where _ResourceId =~ '{wvdworkspace}' and ("{ActivityType}" == Type or "{ActivityType}" == "*")
    | where "{SelectedClientType}" == "*" or "{SelectedClientType}" == ClientType
    | summarize StartTime=min(TimeGenerated), EndTime=max(TimeGenerated) by UserName, ClientType, ClientVersion, RefreshOperation=substring(CorrelationId, 0, 36 - 4)
)
| extend ClientTypeShort=replace("com.microsoft.rdc.", "", ClientType), ProbeTime = range(bin_at(StartTime, {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:start}), bin_at(EndTime + {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:grain}, {TimeRange:end}), {TimeRange:grain})
| mv-expand ProbeTime to typeof(datetime)
| extend ConnectionContainsProbe = (StartTime < ProbeTime and EndTime > ProbeTime),
         ConnectionEndedInPreviousBucket = (StartTime < ProbeTime and EndTime + {TimeRange:grain} >= ProbeTime)
| extend ShouldCount = ConnectionContainsProbe or ConnectionEndedInPreviousBucket
| make-series Users=dcountif(UserName, ShouldCount) on ProbeTime from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end}+{TimeRange:grain} step {TimeRange:grain} by {SelectedAggregationLevel}
content.title: {ChartTitle}
content.noDataMessage: There were no activities found for the selected filters

items.name: Active users by client over time

content.query:
WVDConnections
| where "{ActivityType}" == Type or "{ActivityType}" == "*"
| where "{SelectedClientType}" == "*" or "{SelectedClientType}" == ClientType
| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| union
(
    WVDFeeds
    | where _ResourceId =~ '{wvdworkspace}' and ("{ActivityType}" == Type or "{ActivityType}" == "*")
    | where "{SelectedClientType}" == "*" or "{SelectedClientType}" == ClientType
)
| summarize Users=dcount(UserName), Activities=dcount(CorrelationId) by ClientType, ClientVersion
| as VersionData
| join kind=leftouter
(
    VersionData
    | extend ExtendedVersion=strcat(ClientVersion, '.0.0.0.0')
    | extend FirstFourSegments=indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".") + 1) + 1) + 1)
    | extend NormalizedVersion=substring(ExtendedVersion, 0, FirstFourSegments)
    | distinct ClientType, ClientVersion, NormalizedVersion
    | as VersionCatalog
    | join kind=inner
    (
        VersionCatalog
        | distinct ClientType, NormalizedVersion
        | extend SplitVersion=split(NormalizedVersion, '.')
        | order by ClientType, toint(SplitVersion[0]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[1]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[2]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[3]) desc
        | extend VersionSortIndex=row_number(1, prev(ClientType) != ClientType)
        | project ClientType, NormalizedVersion, VersionSortIndex
    ) on ClientType, NormalizedVersion
    | project ClientType, ClientVersion, VersionSortIndex
) on ClientType, ClientVersion
| project VersionSortIndex, ClientType=replace("com.microsoft.rdc.", "", ClientType), ClientVersion, Users, Activities
| sort by VersionSortIndex asc

content.query:
WVDConnections
| where "{ActivityType}" == Type or "{ActivityType}" == "*"

| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| union
(

    | where "{SelectedClientType}" == "*" or "{SelectedClientType}" == ClientType
)

| as VersionData
| join kind=leftouter
(
    VersionData
    | extend ExtendedVersion=strcat(ClientVersion, '.0.0.0.0')
    | extend FirstFourSegments=indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".") + 1) + 1) + 1)
    | extend NormalizedVersion=substring(ExtendedVersion, 0, FirstFourSegments)
    | distinct ClientType, ClientVersion, NormalizedVersion
    | as VersionCatalog
    | join kind=inner
    (
        VersionCatalog
        | distinct ClientType, NormalizedVersion
        | extend SplitVersion=split(NormalizedVersion, '.')
        | order by ClientType, toint(SplitVersion[0]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[1]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[2]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[3]) desc
        | extend VersionSortIndex=row_number(1, prev(ClientType) != ClientType)

    ) on ClientType, NormalizedVersion

content.query:
let LatestClientsReleaseTimes =
WVDConnections
| where "{SelectedClientType}" == "*" or "{SelectedClientType}" == ClientType
| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| summarize FirstSeen=min(TimeGenerated) by ClientType, ClientVersion
| join kind=fullouter
(
    WVDFeeds
    | where _ResourceId =~ '{wvdworkspace}' and ("{SelectedClientType}" == "*" or "{SelectedClientType}" == ClientType)
    | summarize FirstSeen=min(TimeGenerated) by ClientType, ClientVersion
) on ClientType, ClientVersion
| project ClientType=coalesce(ClientType, ClientType1), ClientVersion=coalesce(ClientVersion, ClientVersion1), FirstSeen=min_of(FirstSeen, FirstSeen1)
| extend ExtendedVersion=strcat(ClientVersion, '.0.0.0.0')
| extend FirstFourSegments=indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".") + 1) + 1) + 1)
| extend NormalizedVersion=substring(ExtendedVersion, 0, FirstFourSegments)
| as VersionCatalog
| join kind=inner
(
    VersionCatalog
    | distinct ClientType, NormalizedVersion
    | extend SplitVersion=split(NormalizedVersion, '.')
    | order by ClientType, toint(SplitVersion[0]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[1]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[2]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[3]) desc
    | extend VersionSortIndex=row_number(1, prev(ClientType) != ClientType)
    | project ClientType, NormalizedVersion, VersionSortIndex
) on ClientType, NormalizedVersion
| project ClientType, ClientVersion, FirstSeen, VersionSortIndex;
WVDConnections
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and ("{SelectedClientType}" == "*" or "{SelectedClientType}" == ClientType)
| where _ResourceId =~ '{HostPool}'
| summarize ConnectionCount=dcount(CorrelationId), LastSeen=max(TimeGenerated) by UserName, ClientType, ClientVersion
| join kind=fullouter
(
    WVDFeeds
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and _ResourceId =~ '{wvdworkspace}' and ("{SelectedClientType}" == "*" or "{SelectedClientType}" == ClientType)
    | summarize RefreshCount=dcount(CorrelationId), LastSeen=max(TimeGenerated) by UserName, ClientType, ClientVersion
) on UserName, ClientType, ClientVersion
| project UserName=coalesce(UserName, UserName1), ClientType=coalesce(ClientType, ClientType1), ClientVersion=coalesce(ClientVersion, ClientVersion1), LastSeen=max_of(LastSeen1, LastSeen), Connections=coalesce(ConnectionCount, 0), Refreshes=coalesce(RefreshCount, 0)
| project-away *1
| as UserData
| join kind=leftouter
(
    UserData
    | extend ExtendedVersion=strcat(ClientVersion, '.0.0.0.0')
    | extend FirstFourSegments=indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".", indexof(ExtendedVersion, ".") + 1) + 1) + 1)
    | extend NormalizedVersion=substring(ExtendedVersion, 0, FirstFourSegments)
    | distinct ClientType, ClientVersion, NormalizedVersion
    | as VersionCatalog
    | join kind=inner
    (
        VersionCatalog
        | distinct ClientType, NormalizedVersion
        | extend SplitVersion=split(NormalizedVersion, '.')
        | order by ClientType, toint(SplitVersion[0]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[1]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[2]) desc, toint(SplitVersion[3]) desc
        | extend VersionSortIndex=row_number(1, prev(ClientType) != ClientType)
        | project ClientType, NormalizedVersion, VersionSortIndex
    ) on ClientType, NormalizedVersion
    | project ClientType, ClientVersion, VersionSortIndex
) on ClientType, ClientVersion
| project-away *1
| summarize arg_min(VersionSortIndex, *) by UserName, ClientType
| where VersionSortIndex > 1
| extend VersionsBehind=VersionSortIndex-1
| join kind=inner  
(
    LatestClientsReleaseTimes
    | where VersionSortIndex == 1
) on ClientType
| extend TimeDelta=LastSeen-FirstSeen
| where TimeDelta > 1d
| project UserName, ClientType, ClientTypeShort=replace("com.microsoft.rdc.", "", ClientType), ClientVersion, LastSeen, Connections, Refreshes, LatestVersion=ClientVersion1, FirstSeen, TimeDelta=TimeDelta/1d
| extend RowLabel=strcat(ClientTypeShort, " - Newest: ", LatestVersion)
| sort by TimeDelta desc

parameters.label: Counter Name

Perf

content.query:
let Trend=Perf
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query} and Computer == "{Computer:name}" and ObjectName == "{Object}" and CounterName == "{CounterName}"
| project _ResourceId, CounterName, InstanceName, TimeGenerated, CounterValue
| make-series Trend =round(avg(CounterValue), 2) default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by CounterName, InstanceName
| project Trend, InstanceName;
Perf
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query} and Computer == "{Computer:name}"  and ObjectName == "{Object}" and CounterName == "{CounterName}"
| project _ResourceId, CounterName, InstanceName, TimeGenerated,CounterValue
| summarize Average = avg(CounterValue), P95th = percentiles(CounterValue, 95), P5th= percentiles(CounterValue, 5), TimeGenerated= min(TimeGenerated) by CounterName, InstanceName
| join Trend on InstanceName
| project InstanceName, Average, P5th, P95th, TimeGenerated, Trend
| order by Average desc

Perf
| where ObjectName == "User Input Delay per Process"
| where Computer == "{Computer:name}"
| extend SplitAll=split(InstanceName, ':')
| extend InstanceNameID=SplitAll[0]
| extend ProcessID=SplitAll[1]
| summarize Average = avg(CounterValue), P95th = percentiles(CounterValue, 95), P5th= percentiles(CounterValue, 5), TimeGenerated= min(TimeGenerated) by CounterName, Computer, InstanceName
| sort by Average

content.json:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/remote/remote-desktop-services/rds-rdsh-performance-counters

The User Input Delay counter can help you quickly identify the root cause for bad end user RDP experiences. This counter measures how long any user input (such as mouse or keyboard usage) stays in the queue before it is picked up by a process, and the counter works in both local and remote sessions.


One important detail of this counter is that it reports the maximum user input delay within a configurable interval. This is the longest time it takes for an input to reach the application, which can impact the speed of important and visible actions like typing.
Select an Event Log above for further details
Select a source for further details

content.query:
Event
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query} and Computer == "{Computer:name}" and EventLog == "{SelectedEventLog}" and EventLevel <= {MinLevel} and Source == "{SelectedSource}"
| project TimeGenerated, EventLevel, EventLevelName, EventID, RenderedDescription
| top 2000 by TimeGenerated desc

content.query:
SessionHostStatus_CL
| where SubscriptionId == "{Subscription:id}"
| where HostName_s in ({SessionHost}) or '*' in ({SessionHost})
| extend HealthCheckResult = todynamic(HealthCheckResult_s)
//| extend HealthCheckExpand = extract_json("$.", HealthCheckResult, typeof(str))
| mvexpand HealthCheckExpand = HealthCheckResult
| extend HealthCheckName = HealthCheckExpand.HealthCheckName
| extend HealthCheckResult = HealthCheckExpand.HealthCheckResult
| where HealthCheckResult in ({HealthCheckResult}) or '*' in ({HealthCheckResult})
| where HealthCheckResult != "HealthCheckSucceeded" or AllowNewSession_b != "true" or VMPowerState_s != "VM running"
| extend HealthDetailMessage = HealthCheckExpand.AdditionalFailureDetailMessage
| project TimeGenerated, SubscriptionId, AllowNewSession_b, HostName_s, VMPowerState_s, HealthCheckName, HealthCheckResult, HealthDetailMessage, PoolName_s, CurrentSessions_d, StatusTimestamp_t, SxSStackVersion_s, AgentVersion_s

content.title: Search graphics data for a specific session host

content.json: ### The graphics data table generates information whenever end-to-end delay and dropped frames percentages fall below a healthy threshold for Azure Virtual Desktop. This table helps administrators understand factors across the server, client, and network that could be contributing to slow or choppy experiences for a user.

content.query:
WVDConnectionGraphicsDataPreview 
| join kind = leftouter
(
    WVDConnections
    | extend Protocol = iff(UdpUse in ("<>", "0"), "TCP", "UDP")
    | extend GatewayRegion = iff(GatewayRegion in ("<>", ""), "Unknown", GatewayRegion)
    | summarize GatewayRegion = take_anyif(GatewayRegion, GatewayRegion != "Unknown") by CorrelationId, UserName, SessionHostName, Protocol
) on CorrelationId
| project-away CorrelationId1, TenantId
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, UserName, Protocol, GatewayRegion, SessionHostName
content.title: Query all graphics data and correlate with username, protocol, gateway region, and session host name

content.query:
WVDConnectionGraphicsDataPreview
| join kind = leftouter
(
    WVDConnections
    | extend Protocol = iff(UdpUse in ("<>", "0"), "TCP", "UDP")
    | extend GatewayRegion = iff(GatewayRegion in ("<>", ""), "Unknown", GatewayRegion)
    | summarize GatewayRegion = take_anyif(GatewayRegion, GatewayRegion != "Unknown") by CorrelationId, UserName, SessionHostName, Protocol
) on CorrelationId
//| where extract("/subscriptions/.*/resourcegroups/.*/providers/.*/hostpools/(.*)", 1, _ResourceId) == "{HostPool}"
| project-away CorrelationId1
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, UserName, Protocol, GatewayRegion, SessionHostName
